text: Asadollah Asgaroladi (3 March 1934 â€“ 13 September 2019) was an Iranian businessman. He worked in exports, banking, real estate and healthcare. He was the richest person in Iran, with a net worth of $4 billion. On 13 September 2019, Asgaroladi suffered a stroke. Later that day he died in Tehran, at the age of 85.Former chairman of Iran-China Joint Chamber of Commerce passes away ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Iranian businesspeople Category:People from Tehran
title: Asadollah Asgaroladi
